lead_paragraph: A judge gave the maximum penalty to Robert C. Bates, who fatally shot an unarmed black man while working as a volunteer sheriff’s deputy.

headline.print_headline: Tulsa Ex-Volunteer Deputy Sentenced to 4 Years in Shooting Death
headline.main: Ex-Volunteer Deputy in Tulsa Sentenced to 4 Years in Shooting Death

snippet: A judge gave the maximum penalty to Robert C. Bates, who fatally shot an unarmed black man while working as a volunteer sheriff’s deputy.
abstract: Robert C Bates, former volunteer sheriff's deputy in Tulsa County, Okla, is sentenced to four years in prison for fatal shooting of unarmed man Eric C Harris in 2015.
